None.Name: Infused Purge
None.Description: Activate to rid Bloodhorn of all debuff but its own life points are immediately reduced by 1500. It will be immune against all major debuffs for 15 seconds afterwards. Cannot be used anymore once life points have been reduced below 1500. Reusable every 30 seconds.

None.Name: Life Stealer
None.Description: 15% of the damage dealt by the unit will be added to its life points.

None.Name: Stampede
None.Description: Activate to rush towards the target dealing 200 damage to enemies along the way, up to 9000 in total.
